name: White Ball And Flower
description:
A game for Butterscotch ShenaniJam worked with my super awesome animator friend Xiya (https://vimeo.com/user25271547 )!

The making process is very stressful but I haven't felt so productive in a long time. This is awesome! Hopefully you enjoy our game like we do.

Basic Control:

Arrow Keys/WASD

E for shooting

Space for jump

Z for recharging (You won't be able to move while charging so the timing is really important.)

Level 2: Double jump/F for dash, hold shift for run

Level3; Hold control while jumping for fly

Credit:

Programming/Design: Chrane Sylk

Graphic/Animation: Xiya Lan
